alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 11:05AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 1145 AM MST... At 1105 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kings Ranch, or over Gold Canyon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Kings Ranch and Gold Camp. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 198 and 210. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
